summary: Removes the moons Masser and Secunda.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [/b][center][color=tan][b][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8728/17296156115_3502bd29cc_o.png[/img]


Removes the Moons Masser and Secunda.

Reasons: Because I said so.



Actually, I found a bug with Climates of Tamriel and the newest version of ENB's SSAO that made the moons jet black. :/




So this was my way of temporarily dealing with it.
Also I figured some folks may want no moons for... well whatever.

Shouldn't be any bugs, I just made the textures transparent, if there is, tell me. :)

Installation:
Install via NMM.

Uninstallation:
Uninstall via NMM.

Simple, no? [/b] [/color] [/center]
author: pondcypress
